column1: '''Maria Isabel Morna Braga''' (b.[[1919]]) was a Portuguese author and translator.

Maria Isabel Bragaa became the first Portuguese translator of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s work, when he contributed for the first Portuguese-language edition of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' ([[O Gnomo]]), together with [[MÃ¡rio Braga]].
